name: The Exxel Group
overview:
The Exxel Group is an Argentina-based private investment company engaged in sourcing, structuring and lead investing in buyouts of companies worldwide.

The key business objective of the firm is value creation with total dedication to managing its investorsÂ´ capital resources. Exxel firmly believes in the importance of having full managerial control of its investments, in order to adopt and implement critical decisions in its portfolio companies. Exxel utilizes its control positions and operating expertise to create shareholder value through operational improvements.

The Exxel management team is an experienced, multidisciplinary group of professionals with a wide array of knowledge in business operations, investment banking, corporate finance and corporate law, which, added to ExxelÂ´s extensive network of relationships, offers investors a comprehensive package of specialized management and resources.

As the general partner and investment advisor strongly committed with the value maximization of its investments, Exxel - with its proven management capacity - plans to continue expanding companies, concepts and products, which are successfully operating in developed economies into Latin America, as well as doing business in developed economies that gain a competitive advantage by performing part of its operations in Latin America.
